name: CoverageForm
title: Coverage Form
description: The trigger basis that determines when a loss event activates coverage.

concept.definition: Coverage is triggered when the bodily injury or property damage occurs during the policy period, regardless of when the claim is reported.
Coverage is triggered when the claim is first made and reported during the policy period (or extended reporting period), regardless of when the event occurred.
Coverage requires both that the claim be made and that it be reported to the carrier during the policy period.
Coverage is organized around the year in which the accident or loss event took place.
